body: WHAT?! ALL THAT?! JUST THAT?! NIGGA TURN THIS OTHER NIGGY INTO A ZOMBIE THEN LICK EM FOOT GOOD AND BURNED HER? WHY'S THERES NO AMPUTEES? I CAME HERE FOR THE AMPUTEES NIGGA! ALRIGHT.
